text: ane ibrahima (a.Sa.)Num potana pita mate maphini du'a karavi, te phakata vacanana karane hatum, je temane (temana pita sathe) karyum hatum, pachi jyare temana para e vata spasta tha'i ga'i ke te allahana satru che to te temanathi alaga tha'i gaya, kharekhara ibrahima (a.Sa.) Ghana ja vinamra tatha dhairyavana hata
